xal.extension.extlatgen

Class T3dGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.extlatgen.T3dGenerator

  • public class T3dGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    T3dGenerator generates Trace 3D input file from XAL lattice view. Usage: create a T3dGenerator object with an XAL lattice as input, then call the method createT3dInput() which one can specify Scenario.SYNC_MODE_DESIGN, Scenario.SYNC_MODE_LIVE or Scenario.SYNC_MODE_RF_DESIGN data as argument.
